directions: Whisk olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper together in a large bowl. Mix corn and onion into the balsamic dressing. Refrigerate for flavors to blend, about 30 minutes.
Spread arugula onto a serving plate; top with corn mixture and goat cheese slices.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
2 ounces goat cheese, cut into 1/2-inch slices - or more to taste
title: Corn Salad with Arugula
